relevant_findings.right_testicle: firm, nontender scrotal mass, 7 cm in diameter, mobile posterior mass.
relevant_findings.left_testicle: normal echotexture with changes consistent with a varicocele.
relevant_findings.scrotal_skin: normal, no erythema or peau d’orange changes.

relevant_findings.right_testicular_volume: Approximately 33 ml (increased from approximately 19 ml 6 weeks earlier).

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Further enlargement of the right testicle noted with scattered hypoechoic areas developing.
